front.title: Experimental Message Types for Mobile IPv4

abstract.t: Mobile IPv4 message types range from 0 to 255. This documentreserves a message type for use by an individual, company, ororganization for experimental purpose, to evaluate enhancementsto Mobile IPv4 messages before formal standards proposal.Also, Mobile IP defines a general Extension mechanism to allowoptional information to be carried by Mobile IP controlmessages. Extensions are not skippable, if defined in range [0-127] and skippable, if defined in range [128-255]. Thisdocument reserves extension types in both the skippable andnon-skippable range for experimental use.
